Suspend 2 {U} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {U} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]
Stormsplitter Serpent's power is equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.
flavor_text: [i]Traveling the seas of Jaelicia is no easy feat. Best to bring a mage or two.[/i]
